price: 17. Kuwa ka fogaada inay caabudaan Daaquut (ilaahyada beenta)4  oo u laabta Allaah (iyagoo toobad keen ah), waxay leeyihiin bishaaro; ee u bishaaree addoomahayga.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱجۡتَنَبُواْ ٱلطَّٰغُوتَ أَن يَعۡبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ لَهُمُ ٱلۡبُشۡرَىٰۚ فَبَشِّرۡ عِبَادِ
footnotes: 4. Daaquut waxaa loola jeedaa shaydaanka, ama wax kastoo la caabudo Alle sokadi iyagoo ku raalli ah caabudiddaas.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ij'tanabū al-ṭāghūta an yaʿbudūhā wa-anābū ilā al-lahi lahumu al-bush'rā fabashir ʿibādi
